character.statement: Where is the rest of this Island?!
But I don't have any Pop Coins!
This is ludicrous.
So that's it? I saved the day!?
What is Plan B?
I think this is above my pay grade... any idea how to fight this thing?
What now? Do we celebrate?
All that work and we don't even get cake?
Go to MegaFightingBots? Nobody has ever made it out of that game in one piece. It's impossible.
They fixed the bug with my speech! If only I had something worthwhile to say...
The Poptropica creators are so slow! I need to play the next island! I can't breathe without it!
Poptropica has pets! Finally! This is just what I always wanted!
All they do is eat! Whose horrible idea was this?
These pets are driving me insane!
Poptropica has pets! Finally! This is just what I always wanted!
Looks like this little guy is hungry again. C'mon, boy, let's go to the old cheese factory. We'll find some food there.
Narf, narf!

exchange.question: You look frazzled. What's wrong?
exchange.answer: We're so behind! The new Poptropica managers slashed the budgets and fired almost everyone!

exchange.question: Can I help?
exchange.answer: Usually some random Poptropican comes along and tells you what's wrong on the island, but we can't even afford that anymore!

exchange.question: Maybe you're the random Poptropican and you just don't realize it?
exchange.answer: Y'know, I never thought of that...

character.statement: We're never going to get this island out on time!
I don't believe it! All of the problems are fixed and the island is ready to launch. Poptropica is back!
The only thing missing is a final Poptropica-style twist. There should be an enemy who's been hiding in plain sight, but who could it be?
Good riddance!
Are you kidding? We need to get started on the next island. We're already behind schedule!
I guess it wouldn't be a proper island if we didn't give you a glitzy, but ultimately worthless tchotchke at the end.
We need to get started on the next island. We're already behind schedule!
Maybe we can re-hire him now that MegaFightingBots is kaput.
Sounds like he's gone cuckoo bananas.
Sure, we didn't need to get the next island out on schedule anyway.
I've got it! My best idea yet!

exchange.question: What is it?
exchange.answer: Poptropica Coins! Everything will cost Poptropica Coins.

exchange.question: What do players spend coins on?
exchange.answer: Literally everything! Want to feed your pet? 1 Pop Coin. Want to get on the blimp? 1 Pop Coin.

exchange.question: That sounds terrible. The whole idea -- just terrible.
exchange.answer: When you say terrible, do you mean terrific? If so, I agree!

character.statement: I should come up with a clever name for these coins.... Maybe Pop Bucks! Or Pop-Sheckles? Poptropi-Currency?
One Pop Coin to leave Main Street, please.
Sorry! Not my problem!

exchange.question: Here's your Pop Coin, you thieving cheapskate.
exchange.answer: Pleasure doing business with you. Come back soon now, y'hear?

character.statement: Okay, this is it â€“ this is my best idea yet!
Get moving! You need to find 1,000 Soda Pop Bottles. The first one is atop Poptropica Worldwide HQ.

exchange.question: What's your brilliant idea now?
exchange.answer: Collectibles! Only for truly obsessed gamers.

exchange.question: What does that mean?
exchange.answer: We'll make players jump through hoops to track down and collect random useless stuff. Great, right?

exchange.question: Not great. Tedious.
exchange.answer: Try it before you judge! First assignment: pick up 1,000 Soda Pop Bottles. Here's a hint to get started: the first one is atop Poptropica Worldwide HQ.

exchange.question: What's your brilliant idea now?
exchange.answer: Collectibles! Only for truly obsessed gamers.

exchange.question: What does that mean?
exchange.answer: We'll make players jump through hoops to track down and collect random useless stuff. Great, right?

exchange.question: Not great. Tedious.
exchange.answer: Try it before you judge! First assignment: pick up 1,000 Soda Pop Bottles. Here's a hint to get started: the first one is atop Poptropica Worldwide HQ.

exchange.question: What's the matter?
exchange.answer: This blasted crate is too big. I can't get past.

exchange.question: What's in the box?
exchange.answer: The rest of the soda bottles! You can't collect them if I don't hide them in illogical, out-of-the-way places!

exchange.question: Can I help?
exchange.answer: Just do something, anything, to get this crate open!

character.statement: Figure out a way to get this crate open!
Maybe collectibles weren't such a great idea...
We are the enemies who have been hiding in plain sight! Surprise: we own both Poptropica and MegaFightingBots.com!
Only one can survive!
We must summon...
The real life Mega Fighting Bots!
You haven't seen the last of us! We'll build a new game!
We were trying to drive Poptropica out of business, but you fixed all the problems we worked so hard to create!
It's time for Plan B.
The real life Mega Fighting Bots!
We'll go mobile!
What a twist, right?
The real life Mega Fighting Bots!
But where?
Stop! Jumping off of a building is dangerous without the right equipment. Take this!
No jumping off anything without the proper headgear!
You know what we must do, business associates.
The real life Mega Fighting Bots!
To the cloud!
Nope. And there's only one thing to do when we're out of ideas: a gratuitous action sequence!
MegaFightingBots... Figures. They poached my best coder months ago!
MegaFightingBots... Figures. They poached my best coder months ago!
I don't know. He started acting strange shortly after he began working there. This was the last email I got from him.
I haven't heard from him since.
I'm worried. Somebody should go after him.
Maybe not. Meet me by the development computer and I'll show you a secret project I've been working on.
Enjoy those coins... there's always more where that came from!

exchange.question: Who are you?
exchange.answer: I was a Poptropica developer, but those heartless new managers fired me!

exchange.question: So now you slink around in the dark like a creeper?
exchange.answer: No, now I'm handing out counterfeit Pop Coins. It's my revenge!

exchange.question: Can I have some Pop Coins?
exchange.answer: Here, take as many as you want!
